ygData.subject: Re: Jewelery Roller coaster HINT
ygData.msgSnippet: I am not positive this coralates, but let me tell you my secret for keeping my loses down. First off, as you get higher and higher, this failure rate drops
ygData.messageBody:
I am not positive this coralates, but let me tell you my secret for
keeping my loses down.

First off, as you get higher and higher, this failure rate drops right
off. I did not fail a single ring last night at 88 skill.

Sometimes the random number generator is dead against us, and sometimes
it is really for us. So what I do is fish. I fish through al the really
bad droughts of no successes, and when things feel like I am getting
lots more success, I break out my kit until it goes downhill again, then
start over. Now, I am not sure that fishing and jewelry are in any way
related, certainly sas skills they are not. But as a programmer mysel;f,
I would most likely be using the same routiens for every skill's random
numbers, and hence my theory of the fishing for jewelery =)

> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelery Roller coaster
>
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> With a skill of 52 I failed 6 out of 11 attempts at making jaded
> silver
> rings which, as you all know, become trivial at 40. Is anyone else
> having the same experience? I had a wisdom of 101 and intelligence of
> 132 at the time.
>
